title: Georgia Melodians 1924-1926 Timeles Historical CBC
description:
GEORGA MELODIANS - 1924-1926
      
01. Why Did You Do It?    [3:31] (Jessell/Reisman/Breau/Tobias)
02. I Can't Get The One I Want    [3:42] (Handman/Rose/Ruby)
03. Red Hot Mamma    [3:46] (Wells/Bud Cooper/Fred Rose)
04. Charley, My Boy    [3:43] (Gus Kahn/Ted FioRito)
05. San    [3:52] (McPhail/Michels)
06. Everybody Loves My Baby    [3:53] (Palmer/Williams)
07. Doo Wac A Doo (A "Wow-Wow")    [3:28] (Gaskill/Donaldson/Horthar)
08. I'm Satisfied (Beside That Sweetie O'Mine)    [3:40] (Yellen/Pinkard)
09. I'm Bound for Tennessee    [3:40] (Little/Gillespie/FioRito)
10. My Mammy's Blues    [3:30] (J. Spikes/B. Spikes)
11. Give Us The Charleston    [3:39] (De Sylva/Henderson)
12. Yes Sir, That's My Baby    [4:14] (Kahn/Donaldson)
13. She's Drivin' Me Wild    [4:22] (Marks/Fields)
14. Red Hot Henry Brown    [4:19] (Fred Rose)
15. Spanish Shawl    [3:36] (Meyers/Melrose/Schoebel)
16. Charleston Ball    [3:38] (Donald Heywood)
17. I've Found a New Baby    [3:52] (Palmer/Spencer)
18. Hangin' Around    [3:42] (Gardner/Harris)
19. Rhythm Of The Day    [3:58] (Murphy/Lindley)
20. Ev'rybody's Charleston Crazy    [4:05] (Holmes)

approximate roster (at least for the earlier sessions):

Charles Boulanger: violin, bandleader (or front man)
Ernie Intelhouse: cornet
Herb Winfield: trombone
Clarence Hutchins: clarinet, alto sax, tenor sax
Merritt Kenworthy: clarinet, alto sax, baritone sax
Oscar Young: piano
Elmer Merry: banjo, guitar
Carl Gerold: drums
Vernon Dalhart (tracks 3,14): vocals

Recorded in New York, July 14, 1924 - September 4, 1926

Audio restoration & digital transfers by John R.T. Davies

1996 Timeless CBC (Chris Barber Collection)
